risc1.name: load
risc1.description: Loads word from memory at location TOS (or imm) and pushes it onto the register stack

risc1.name: loadf
risc1.description: Loads word from the flag register and pushes it onto the register stack

risc1.name: store
risc1.description: Stores the word from TOS (or imm) into memory to the location at TOS

risc1.name: storef
risc1.description: Stores the word from TOS into the flag register

risc1.name: swap
risc1.description: Swaps two top values from TOS (top of the register stack)

risc1.name: dup
risc1.description: Duplicates the top value from the register stack

risc1.name: dup2
risc1.description: Duplicates the second from top value from the register stack

risc1.name: mov
risc1.description: Pushes the value of imm to the register stack

risc1.name: push
risc1.description: Pushes the word from tos onto the memory stack

risc1.name: pushf
risc1.description: Pushes the word from the flag register onto the memory stack

risc1.name: pop
risc1.description: Pops the word from the memory stack onto top of the register stack

risc1.name: popf
risc1.description: Pops the word from the memory stack to the flag register

risc1.name: add
risc1.description: Adds two top values from tos and pushes the result onto tos

risc1.name: sub
risc1.description: Subtracts the second tos from the top of the register stack, pushing the result onto it

risc1.name: mul
risc1.description: Multiplies two top values from tos and pushes the result onto tos

risc1.name: div
risc1.description: Divides the tos value by the second from tos, pushing the result onto it

risc1.name: and
risc1.description: Performs a binary and operation between two top tos values, pushing the result onto it

risc1.name: or
risc1.description: Performs a bitwise or operation between two top tos values, pushing the result onto it

risc1.name: xor
risc1.description: Performs a bitwise xor operation between two top tos values, pushing the result onto it

risc1.name: not
risc1.description: Performs a bitwise not operation on tos value, pushing the result onto the register stack

risc1.name: lsh
risc1.description: Performs a bitwise left shift operation on tos value, moving it imm bits to the left, and pushing the value onto tos

risc1.name: rsh
risc1.description: Performs a bitwise right shift operation on tos value, moving it imm bits to the right, and pushing the value onto tos

risc1.name: call
risc1.description: Pushes the next instruction's location on to the memory stack, transfers control to the location at tos or off

risc1.name: ret
risc1.description: Returns control to the instruction saved on the memory stack

risc1.name: cmpe
risc1.description: Compares either two values on top of the register stack, or tos and num for equality, pushing the result onto tos (True is 0xffff, False is 0x0000)

risc1.name: cmpb
risc1.description: Compares either two values on top of the register stack, or tos and num, determining whether the first is bigger than second. Pushing the result of the check onto tos (True is 0xffff, False is 0x0000)

risc1.name: jmp
risc1.description: Unconditionally performs the jump by tos (or off) instructions

risc1.name: jc
risc1.description: Checks whether the tos value is True, and if it is, performs the jump by tos (or off) instructions

risc1.name: in
risc1.description: Hangs the processor, waiting for the single-character user input on the device at the port specified, pushes it onto tos

risc1.name: out
risc1.description: Transfers data from tos to the device at port

risc1.name: nop
risc1.description: Does not do anything

risc3.name: load
risc3.description: Loads word from memory at location mem into register reg

risc3.name: store
risc3.description: Copies word from the register reg and stores it in memory at location mem

risc3.name: mov_low
risc3.description: Copies the value of num into the lower (less significant) byte of reg

risc3.name: mov_high
risc3.description: Copies the value of num into the higher (more significant) byte of reg

risc3.name: mov
risc3.description: Copies the value of reg2 into reg1

risc3.name: push
risc3.description: Pushes the value of reg on the top of the memory stack

risc3.name: pop
risc3.description: Pops the value from the memory stack into reg

risc3.name: add
risc3.description: Adds the value of reg3 to the register reg2, saving the result in the register reg1

risc3.name: sub
risc3.description: Subtracts the value of reg3 from the register reg2, saving the result in the register reg1

risc3.name: mul
risc3.description: Multiplies the value from reg2 times reg3, saving the result in the register reg1

risc3.name: div
risc3.description: Divides the value from reg2 by reg3, saving the result in the register reg1

risc3.name: and
risc3.description: Computes binary and between reg2 and reg3 and saves the result into reg1

risc3.name: or
risc3.description: Computes binary or between reg2 and reg3 and saves the result into reg1

risc3.name: xor
risc3.description: Computes binary xor between reg2 and reg3 and saves the result into reg1

risc3.name: not
risc3.description: Computes binary not between reg2 and saves the result into reg1

risc3.name: lsh
risc3.description: Shifts the value from register reg2 by reg3 to the left, saving the result in the register reg1

risc3.name: rsh
risc3.description: Shifts the value from register reg2 by reg3 to the right, saving the result in the register reg1

risc3.name: call
risc3.description: Saves the next instruction's location to the Link Register, transfers control to the location at num or reg

risc3.name: ret
risc3.description: Transfers control back to the instruction saved in the Link Register

risc3.name: cmp
risc3.description: Subtracts the second value from the first one, changing the flags accordingly

risc3.name: test
risc3.description: Performs bitwise and operation between the reg1 and reg2, changing the flags accordingly

risc3.name: jmp
risc3.description: Jumps to the location at reg (or num) unconditionally

risc3.name: je
risc3.description: Jumps to the location at num if the first number in the compare instruction was equal to the second

risc3.name: jne
risc3.description: Jumps to the location at num if the first number in the compare instruction was not equal to the second

risc3.name: jg
risc3.description: Jumps to the location at num if the first number in the compare instruction was greater than the second

risc3.name: jge
risc3.description: Jumps to the location at num if the first number in the compare instruction was greater or equal than the second

risc3.name: jl
risc3.description: Jumps to the location at num if the first number in the compare instruction was less than the second

risc3.name: jle
risc3.description: Jumps to the location at num if the first number in the compare instruction was less or equal than the second

risc3.name: in
risc3.description: Hangs the processor, waiting for the single-character user input on the device at the port specified, saving the result into reg

risc3.name: out
risc3.description: Transfers data from num (or reg) to the device at port

risc3.name: nop
risc3.description: Does not do anything
